job_description.overview: Responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software applications across the SDLC.
responsibilities: Design and build software solutions using programming languages like Java, Python, or C++.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
Participate in debugging, testing, and troubleshooting software issues.
Work in Agile teams and take part in sprint planning and reviews.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
Relevant certifications (e.g., Oracle Java) are a plus.

job_description.overview: Develops frontend and backend components of modern web applications.
responsibilities: Build responsive UIs using React or Angular.
Design and develop APIs with Node.js or Django.
Implement authentication and database integrations.
Work on CI/CD and deployment automation.
qualifications: B.Tech in Computer Science or equivalent experience in full-stack projects.

job_description.overview: Interprets data and transforms it into actionable insights for business decisions.
responsibilities: Clean and preprocess data using Python or SQL.
Build dashboards with Power BI or Tableau.
Collaborate with business teams to define KPIs.
Run exploratory data analysis and generate reports.
qualifications: Bachelor’s in Data Science, Statistics, or related field.

job_description.overview: Designs, develops, and deploys machine learning models and pipelines.
responsibilities: Train and evaluate machine learning models.
Perform feature engineering and data preparation.
Deploy models to production using Docker or cloud services.
Work closely with software engineers and data scientists.
qualifications: Master’s or Bachelor’s in Computer Science or AI/ML specialization.

job_description.overview: Automates development pipelines and manages scalable infrastructure deployments.
responsibilities: Create and maintain CI/CD pipelines.
Automate infrastructure using Terraform or Ansible.
Monitor and troubleshoot production systems.
Collaborate with developers and IT operations teams.
qualifications: Bachelor’s in IT or Computer Science, DevOps certifications preferred.
